title: Court ordered debt form 10 years ago. now at the franchise tax board. how can I consolidate or get rid of the debt .
question: court ordered to victim services in 2003. never sent a bill
answers: You should consult with a local BK atty. You can find one by clicking the tab "Find a Lawyer". Many fine lawyers offer a free consultation.

Your question is not very clear, but consolidation of debt is possible under Chapter 13 of the bankruptcy code. See an attorney in your neighborhood today for more advise, you can find one on the website you posted to (avvo.com). If you have franchise tax debt, you must pay the amount back, but being in Chapter 13 will stop the accruing penalties or interest, although the principal must be paid back.
